item.title: Mridula add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "Women don't want to hear what you think. Women want to hear what they think - in a deeper voice." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Mridula add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "Parents are not interested in justice, they're interested in peace and quiet." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Mridula add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "You can turn painful situations around through laughter. If you can find humor in anything, even poverty, you can survive it." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Mridula add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "Every closed eye is not sleeping, and every open eye is not seeing." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Mridula add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: " Nothing separates the generations more than music. By the time a child is eight or nine, he has developed a passion for his own music that is even stronger than his passions for procrastination and weird clothes." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Mridula add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "In spite of the seven thousand books of expert advice, the right way to disciplne a child is still a mystery to most fathers and...mothers Only your grandmother and Genghis Khan know how to do it." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Mridula add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "If you want to be seen, stand up. If you want to be heard, speak up. If you want to be appreciated, shut up." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Mridula add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "I don't know the key to success; but, the key to failure is trying to please everybody." -- Bill Cosby
